vulnerabilities.description: transfer() (2300 gas limit) may fail if gas costs increase. Use call() instead.
vulnerabilities.fix: Use call() with appropriate gas amount: (bool success, ) = to.call{value: amount}("")

vulnerabilities.description: Floating pragma ^ used: ^0.8.0. Contracts should be deployed with exact compiler version.
vulnerabilities.fix: Use exact pragma version: pragma solidity X.Y.Z
vulnerabilities.impact: Unexpected behavior with different compiler versions

vulnerabilities.description: Your contract could be improved with these best practices:
vulnerabilities.fix:
• Add events for important state changes
• Consider adding zero address validation for critical address parameters
• Add NatSpec comments (@param, @return) for better documentation
